extensions.purpose: ecosystem utility token for art certification, rewards, and platform access
extensions.description: Fondart is a utility token powering the Amoarte.net ecosystem. It supports art certification, digital provenance, rewards, and access utilities within a transparent blockchain environment on Base Mainnet. The token has a fixed supply and is not currently traded on any exchange.

roadmap.phase1: Token deployment and integration into Amoarte.net ecosystem (Completed Q2 2023)
roadmap.phase2: Platform expansion and certification system development (Ongoing 2024â€“2025)
roadmap.phase4: Liquidity pool and exchange visibility (Planned Q4 2026)

art.name: Art & Collectibles
art.description: Tokens supporting art-related ecosystems, digital certification, and creative economies.

utility.name: Utility Token
utility.description: Tokens used internally within a specific platform for access, governance, or reward purposes.

ecosystem.name: Ecosystem Token
ecosystem.description: Tokens representing functional or operational components of a decentralized platform.

verified.name: Verified Contract
verified.description: Token contract verified on BaseScan with matching source code.
